name: Birds of a Feather (Temporary Studios)
description:
Birds of a Feather is a puzzle platformer in which you play as a bird that can teleport to its Echo self. The game is based around tight controls and thoughtful routing.

Controller recommended.

Xbox controller controls:

Joystick to move

A to jump

B to dash

X to teleport

Keyboard controls:

WASD to move

Spacebar to jump

K to dash

L to teleport
